name: Labyrinths of La Coshe
overview: An adventure in which you must discover the secret entrance to the labyrinths beneath the ancient Grecian town of La Coshe. Once inside, the objective is to collect as much treasure as possible. Extra points can be gained by visiting different rooms (there are over 100 of them). Locations to visit include the strongroom and vault, Hades, the control room and the Grotto.
